name: WallShadow
description:
Do you remember when you were a child and electricity in your house ran out
and then you played making shadows on the wall with the light of a candle or a lantern?

Remember that sweet childhood feeling with "Wallshadow"

Game developed for Lux Jam - March 2020
Theme: "Light and Shadow"

How to Play 🎮

• Place objects in front of the light to assemble the correct shape of the shadow

• You can rotate and change the size of the object

Credits ⚒️

• Euler Moises: Art 🎨 / Audio 🎼

• Kaish: Code ⌨️

Dev. Notes 📑

• If the game is silent, please, refresh the page ⚠️

• All game content was developed during game jam (i.e. Art, Music, Code, etc)
